title: #148: The Staircase: Todd and Michael Peterson, the Bloody Footprint and Murder Weapon
description:
Jim, Laura and Lisa continue discussions about the 13 episodes of the Netflix miniseries “The Staircase” where Michael Peterson’s life is put under the microscope after Kathleen Peterson was found dead at the bottom of the staircase.


Todd, Michael’s son, was at the house the night Michael Peterson called 911 and before the paramedics arrived. Jim and Laura deconstruct Todd’s behaviour and statements along with his father’s, Michael Peterson. 


Jim and Laura discuss the bloody footprint that was found on Kathleen’s sweat pants and what they believe caused Kathleen’s injuries which resulted in Kathleen’s death. 


#HerNameWasKathleenPeterson
